pickup.goOver: You get in your car and drive over to girlname's place.
pickup.earlyComment: girltalk Oh! You're early! I wasn't expecting you to show up on time!
bladderBulgeDesc: You also see the bulge of her overfull bladder.
You notice her stomach is swollen where her bladder is.
pickup.prePeed: girltalk I know you asked me to wait, but I couldn't hold it - I had to pee.
lateHold: girlname whispers shyly: I'm so glad you're finally here - I've really got to pee!
arriveHold: girlname whispers shyly: I've been been bursting my bladder waiting for you.
askedHold: girltalk I waited to pee like you asked.
girltalk I've been holding my bladder like you wanted.
pickup.pickupMsg: You're at girlname's place to pick her up.

choices.askToilet: Ask if you can use her toilet.

choices.wantVisit: Accept girlname's invitation to go home with her.
choices.allowPee: Tell her she should go and pee.
choices.askBathroom: Ask if you can use her bathroom

arrive: You and girlname arrive at her place.
It's a 3rd floor apartment in a nice complex.
theHome.inviteUp: She invites you to come up for a drink.
theHome.goodnight: girltalk Good Night... See you soon?
theHome.goElevator: You take girlname by the hand and go to wait in front of the elevator.
elevArriveEmer: The elevator finally appears, and girlname rushes to enter as the door opens. She suddenly steps back and stands still, trembling with the effort to conceal her desperation, as a pretty woman walks out.
girlname lunges into the elevator and mashes the 3rd floor button with one hand while openly holding herself with the other.
theHome.elevArrive: The elevator appears, so you step inside with girlname and hit the button for the 3rd floor.
elevWait: The elevator has not yet arrived.
elevWaitQuote: girltalk It should be here any moment.
girltalk I've had a really great night so far. This is the best date I've had in years!
girltalk I wish I had some champagne at my flat. That would make this night perfect.
elevWaitEmerQuote: girltalk God Dammit, why is it taking so long?!
girltalk I don't know if I can wait for this.
girtalk This fucking elevator is so slow!
elev3rdFloor: The elevator finally reaches the 3rd floor.
You and girlname walk across the hall to the door of her apartment.
theHome.sheHasKeys: girltalk Good thing I haven't lost my keys, huh?
theHome.inElev: You're in the elevator with girlname.
theHome.searchKeys: girlname searches through her purse for her keys.
theHome.lostKeys: girltalk I can't find my keys!
theHome.lookKeys: Offer to look for her keys.
theHome.getKeys: You pull her keys from your pocket.
theHome.giveKeysDesp: girlname grabs the keys and opens the door.
keysNvm: girltalk Oh, never mind. Want to come in?
keysGood: You: Oh, they fell out of your purse when we left the elevator and I grabbed them so you wouldn't lose them.
"Thank you! I wouldn't know what to do without you! Please, come inside with me."
keysBad: girlgasp You stole them when I was in the bathroom. How could you!.
She raises her hand and slaps you.
Your cheek throbs as she grabs the key out of your hand quickly entering her flat before slamming the door closed behind her.
offersPurse: You accept the purse, palming the keys in your pocket. Before rummaging through it
theHome.rummagePurse: You palm the keys in your pocket, as you continue rummaging through her purse.
theHome.atHome: You are with girlname at her home.
kissExceeded: girlname suddenly pulls away from you and sits straight up.
girltalk You know, this just isn't working out.
girltalk I'm afraid we're going to have to call it a night.
champagneLose: She waves vaguely behind her in the direction fo the hallway.
theHome.inviteBedroom: She invites you to come back to her bedroom.
